inclusion.criterion: Pre- and post-pubertal patients who are diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who wish to preserve their ovarian function
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cancers with high risk of ovarian metastasis such as leukemia and non-Hodgkin lymphoma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known positive bone marrow for leukemia or solid tumor
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Tumor in an organ that communicates with the peritoneum and peritoneal sampling at time of primary excision shows evidence of disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman who comes to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
